subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Cox set a dubious record. Barry Bonds was in Hank Aaron’s home city for the first time since breaking Aaron’s home run record. And Atlanta pulled out a 5-4 victory over San Francisco in the ninth inning last night.
snippet: Bobby Cox set a dubious record. Barry Bonds was in Hank Aaron’s home city for the first time since breaking Aaron’s home run record. And Atlanta pulled out a 5-4 victory over San Francisco in the ninth inning last night.
